name: Feature Request
about: New feature or user story
title: 'Feature: <short description>'
labels: ['feature']
assignees: ''
---

## User Story

_As a [user], I want [goal], so that [reason]._

## Description

Short explanation of the feature and expected behavior.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Behavior is clearly defined
- [ ] UI and interaction are described
- [ ] Works on mobile and desktop
- [ ] Error states considered (if relevant)

## Tasks

- [ ] Implement feature
- [ ] Style UI
- [ ] Connect data (if needed)
- [ ] Update documentation (if needed)

## Notes

Design links, screenshots, or related issues.
